values: Welcome to my selling journal! Here you'll find a variety of handmade, vintage, and thrift store goodies! These items range from dresses to purses, and from lunch boxes to shoes. Just browse through the entries to see what is still up for grabs and what has already been sold. I will trade, if you have something I want. RULES: 1. You can do several things to claim an item. Either comment, IM, or e-mail me. If there is more than one person who wants a certain item I will take the highest bidder. 2.I will accept money orders, checks, and well concealed cash. 3.I try to make the prices reasonably cheap/affordable, but if you don't like a price try to haggle with me! I will wash and iron all items before shipping them. 3 dollars postage is required for all clothing, shoes, and purses. No shipping charge for jewelery, belts, pins, etc

NEW! Five dollar (and less) clothing section! Although all these clothes are 5 dollars or less be sure to check the jewelry section which also has many cheap items! This is a skirt that I hand made and hand painted. The paint is fabric paint so it wont' wash off or fade. It's about a size M but with an elastic waist. Price: 5 dollars A cute Woodstock, from Snoopy, t-shirt. Size is a medium but would probablly fit a small. Price: 5 dollars Here is a polo shirt from the 90's or maybe even the 80's. It is a size large, and I think that's a man's size large, it's quite big. Price: 5 dollars This is a vintage shirt that I've loved dearly, but out grown. The girls spell out "blues" and the shirt says "RHYTHM AND BLUES". Size: Small/Medium Price:5 dollars This is a cute, 3/4 length sleeve, shirt that's stripped red and white. It is a ladies size M so if you wear a Large it will fit too, maybe even an XL. Price: 5 dollars This is a pink and purpley/blue striped long sleeve shirt. However, I had to hike up the sleeves because they were too short as this i a children's shirt. It is a kid's size 10, which would be like a kids L or XL Price:5 dollars Here's a unique one of a kind item! i.e.- made by me! ;) It's a little boys understhirt in a size XL that has hand painted (with fabric paint) Kiss Me, I'm IRISH! Price: 3 dollars Himsa, Band Tee. Youth Medium Price: 5 dollars

updated 6.25.04 Shipping for shoes will be an additional 5 dollars A great great belt. Never worn, from Urban Outfitters. It's a deep turqouise type color and a size Small Price: 7 dollars This is another purse that I handmade. It's not that big, measurements are 7" up, 10" across, and 7" deep. Price: 4 dollars Here is a very cute pair of brown and gold shoes. They are from the eighties and, as you can tell, the inside is a little tatty but the outside is in great condition which matters the most! Price: 5 dollars Here is another pair of retro type heels. They are a shiny black with a small/medium sized heel. The toe as a tiny little bow on it that you can see in the second picture. The inside and outside are both in great condition! Price: 5 dollars

updated: 12.30.04 I'm sorry for the quality of these pictures, photobucket really hates me, but if you like something just im me and i'll send the picture to you in a little better quality, or i can take more pictures if you want them. This is a hand made button bracelet. Made on stretchy jewelry string as well. I can make as many of these as requested! Price: 3 dollars A handcrafted wooden bracelet from India. This bracelet was brought back from India by a friend of mine, but the hole for your hand is very small so I can't wear it. The opening is about 2 1/2" Price: 3 dollars This is a very cute pair of earrings. I bought them a few years back and have only worn them, maybe once. They are little suns that are 1" across each. Price: 1 dollar This is a choker with a snowflake pendant. It has a maroon band that is 16" long. Price: 2 dollars Here is a very nice necklace and matching earrings. The beads are hot pink, plastic. Again, this necklace has only been worn once or twice. It's about 17" long. Price: 3 dollars This is a simple black band choker with a silver ring in the middle. The ring has little balck beads embedded in it as well. It is 15 1/2" long. Price: 2 dollars This is a kind of hippie type necklace, about 16" long. Of unknown origin or age. Price: 2 dollars These are some really cute earrings, never before worn. They look almost like candy. They are white, orange, and yellow. Price: 2 dollars This is a bracelet hand made by me. I painted the beads as well, and they are sprayed with a gloss coat so that they don't easily chip or peel. The wooden beads are strung on stretchy jewelery string. Price: 2 dollars This is a cute little anklet, never worn. It has little blue balls in the silver encasing. It is 9" long. Price: 2 dollars Here are three pins. One is a star, one is an 8 ball, and one is Dot from the animated series Animaniacs. Price: 1 dollar(each)

update: 12.30.04 All of the following items are for sale unless otherwise noted. To get more pictures, measurements, info just comment or email me. Also e-mail me or IM me if you don't think the prices are reasonable. SERIOUS BUYERS ONLY! CUTE INDIE, PREPPY, POLKADOT BUTTON UP TOP! This is a shirt that I bought that has only been worn once. It's button up, with slightly puffy sleeves. It's a size medium. Price: 7 dollars Size: Medium VINTAGE, BOHO, HIPPIE TOP! This is, I'm assuming, a somewhat vintage item. It is handmade and very delicate. The fabric is nearly sheer so you'd probablly have to wear something under it. It's about a size medium or large, but these kinds of shirts are sort of one size for all. Price: 5 dollars Size: One size for all SHORTSLEEVED, VINTAGE, INDIE, ROCKABILLY DRESS This is a vintage, 1970's dress. It's in great condition the only problem is that the tag is ripped out so I'm not sure about the size, but it doesn't fit me too well and I usually wear a m/l so it's probablly about a small or medium. Price: 10 dollars Size: Small-Medium VINTAGE, TANK TOP, SUMMER DRESS! This is another vintage dress from the 70's. It has an elastic bossom area that is not for the large chested and all though the camera didn't show it too well but the color is purple with little white tulips. It's a size small. Price: 7 dollars Size: Small This is a cute little shirt that has NEVER been worn, still with tags. It's an asian styled shirt, look at the second picture to see the actual colors. Size is a Medium (stretchy) could probablly fit a small though. Price: 6 dollars Size: Medium This shirt is handmade and vintage LOOKING, but I don't think it's really that old. It's mostly pink with flowers. ALthough this style is pretty one size for all, this shirt is kinda large so I'd say it might be for a medium to XL Price: 5 dollars Size: Baggy Medium to Tight XL This is a relaly cute red and white stripped shirt. It's off the shoulders and 3/4 length sleeves. It's a very little LARGE, so it's more for a medium or small. Price: 7 dollars Size: Fits Small to Medium Here's another very stylish little shirt. It's a purple tank with beading and sprakle on the edges of the collar and arms. It's a size Medium, and I think it's only been worn a few times, if ever. Price: 6 dollars Size: Medium Another off the shoulder, 3/4 length sleeved shirt! This one is pink, maroon, and black stripped. It's a size medium and fits a medium to small. Price: 7 dollars Size: Medium
